title: Cannot See Mastery Level Announcer Banner
body:
Hi all,

I have quite a few champion mastery level 4+ but ingame when getting a multikill or getting a kill in general I cannot see mine, my allies or my oppositions mastery level banner. Does anybody know of a fix? Is there a setting that disables it because I've repaired the game so often and have also reinstalled the game twice with no positive results. Thanks

replies.body: Were you using a champion that was Mastery 4 when you thought a banner should have appeared? Shoot me a screenshot of what you're seeing so I can see whether or not it's working correctly.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YBW2Vsyt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-04T03:07:54.745+0000)
>
> Were you using a champion that was Mastery 4 when you thought a banner should have appeared? Shoot me a screenshot of what you're seeing so I can see whether or not it's working correctly.

s you can see i am lvl 6 mastery on gragas: https://imgur.com/gFfmqGU  but then when I die or get a kill it is not visible: https://imgur.com/60yJtxG

So that's when you're dying. It doesn't look like the special [**mastery announcement banner**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284#h2q4) will be shown when you die, only when.....

> A banner will appear under the multikill announcement in game if:
> - You or a player on your team killed an opponent
> - Whoever performed the kill is playing a champion above rank 4

It still occurs when I get a kill, my apologies it was hard to screenshot a pick while I was getting a kill. I'll link a new screenshot though.

As you can see I am a level 6 mastery gangplank: https://imgur.com/TLzHwl7
I get a kill in lane to fiora: https://imgur.com/Os0Bxo8
I then kill tf with my ultimate: https://imgur.com/NrITCD7
And I am unstoppable: https://imgur.com/WJhADMC

No level 6 mastery banner appears :^)

Thank you for taking your time to help me out! I appreciate it <3

Those aren't multikills though! Here's a screenshot of the requires for that banner.

https://i.gyazo.com/fa7a3b84224a3a52094fa82cc617df17.png

Wait really? It never use to show on single kills? Didn't it always show just on a kill? Was it recently changed? It didn't show banner when I got a double kill, just didn't screenshot it, too caught up tryna get the other enemies xD 

But in practice tool it works:
First Blood: https://imgur.com/yr56566
Kill: https://imgur.com/qjp4i4Y

I'll see if I get into a custom with a real player if it'll display. Thanks again!

H'okay so, I had a quick discussion with some of my game experts and we don't believe that banner is meant to show the way it did in that practice match. Our official FAQ says it's only activated on multikills and that hasn't been changed recently. 

Our assumption is that the Practice Tool is showing the banner because it's practice, where you can test things like that to see how they look maybe?

Hey there, while I was watching one of Gripex's recent YouTube video it shows him and the opposition nidalee with a mastery banner and it wasn't a multikill, it use to show mastery on kills in my matches but when I came back from my ban, I couldn't see the announcer banner. So does my  recent 14 day suspension from 2-3 weeks ago have anything to do with this? Thanks again!

Link: https://imgur.com/DlQY9eQ

The banner always used to show on every single kill, it didn't matter if this was solo, double, triple etc. This was happening until about patch 7.17, ever since then then, banner no longer shows at all. For some reason it still shows for streamers and other people though so i am confused.
Ahhh ok, I'll try and get a double in a match and I'll reply with a screenshot of it. Thanks, I'll let you know when i get the screenshot.
